name: Everyday Pancakes
ingredients: 2 Tbsp. melted butter ½ tsp. salt
steps: Sift together dry ingredients. Add butter, milk and egg and stir just until moistened, will be a little lumpy.
Spray grill and put approximately 2 Tbsp batter for each pancake.
Simple syrup: 1 c. brown sugar, 1 c. white sugar, 1 c. water. Stir and bring ingredients to a boil.
Remove from heat. Add 1 tsp. vanilla, or maple flavoring.
